permafrost.tundra.measure

Class UnitHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.measure.UnitHelper

  • public final class UnitHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with units of measure.

      Disallow instantiation of this class.

        Returns a Unit object given a unit name.

                                            java.util.Locale locale)
        Returns a Unit object given a unit name and locale.
        Parameters:
        unit - A unit name, such as km/h.
        locale - The locale in which the unit name should be interpreted.
        Returns:
        The Unit object representing the unit of measure with the given name.

        public static java.lang.String emit(javax.measure.unit.Unit unit)
        Returns a string representation of the given Unit.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • emit

        public static java.lang.String emit(javax.measure.unit.Unit unit,
                                    java.util.Locale locale)
        Returns a string representation of the given Unit for the given locale.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to be converted to a string.
        locale - The locale to use when converting the Unit to a string.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the given Unit for the given locale.

      • localize

        public static java.lang.String localize(java.lang.String unit,
                                        java.util.Locale inputLocale,
                                        java.util.Locale outputLocale)
        Converts the given unit name from one locale to another.
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit name to be converted.
        inputLocale - The locale in which to interpret the given name.
        outputLocale - The locale to which the unit is converted.
        Returns:
        The converted unit name.
